title.narrative: Center for Kirkeligt Udviklingssamarbejde (CKU) - Pool grant since 2019

description.narrative:
20 million DKK is provided annually for CKUs modality ‘CKU Fund’, which is open to CKU’s member organisations. The primary objective of the CKU Fund is to support projects implemented in partnership between CKU’s Danish member organisations and their local faith-based partners. Support is granted to projects that seek to create meaningful changes and development in local societies. At the same time, funding can be spent on capacity building of local partners as well as on CKU activities that support the overall purpose of the fund.
More here: https://cku.dk/en/knowledge-center/all-resources/
